attributes.action: child abusers should get minium 20 years imprisonment
attributes.additional_details:
those who are sentenced for child abuse : baby p- the abused children , should be sentenced to at least a minium term of 20 years as they are a danger to children and a threat to any community where children live. Those children who escape with thier lives ,are mentally scarred, as in the case of my 3 children ,whose mother and stepdad abused them.
my children attend CAHMS twice weekly and een though, 3 years has passed, thier mother is now free to live her life as she pleases ,while my children wake up with night terrors.
these people need to be removed from society and locked up.
